Story.Name: TTMG_1_3
Story.Desc: [NAME]The practice of devouring the magic of heaven was exposed, and all monks were frightened. So get ready.

Story.Name: TTMG_2_2
Story.Desc: [NAME]Ready to devour the origin of the opponent (absorbing 40 villains can become a chaotic body, the maximum limit can absorb 50 layers, which is five times the full attribute.)

Story.Name: TTMG_6_2
Story.Desc: [NAME]准备好吞噬对方的本源了（吸收不同的小人能获得不同技能等级上限加成，吸收无体质小人则只能提高气海等级上限）。
